survey_properties.intro_message:
Your feedback helps us to build a better understanding of human personality.


We combined your face data with your survey response data to predict your behavior.

It will take less than 8 minutes to answer the survey

Total Questions:20
survey_properties.end_message: Thank you for having the time to take our survey.

questions.question_title: question_1 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
question_2 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
choices: Interpret literally(taking words in their usual or most basic sense without symbol/image)

questions.question_title: question_3 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
choices: Empathetic(showing an ability to understand and share the feelings of another)

questions.question_title: question_4 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
question_5 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
question_6 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
question_7 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
choices: Tactful(having or showing skill and sensitivity in dealing with others)/kind-hearted/encouraging

questions.question_title: question_8 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
question_9 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
choices: Seek many tasks/public activities/interaction with others
Seek private/solitary activities with quiet to concentrate

questions.question_title: question_10 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
question_11 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
choices: Firm(rigid)/tend to criticize/hold the line(not yield to the pressure of a difficult situation.)
Gentle/tend to appreciate/conciliate(stop someone being angry)

questions.question_title: question_12 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
question_13 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
question_14 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
choices: Look to the future/global perspective/“big picture”

questions.question_title: question_15 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
choices: Tough-minded(able to face up)/just(based on or behaving according to what is morally right and fair)

questions.question_title: question_16 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
choices: Go with the flow/adapt as you go

questions.question_title: question_17 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
choices: Active(ready to engage in physically energetic pursuits)/initiate
Reflective(relating to or characterized by deep thought)/deliberate(careful)

questions.question_title: question_18 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
question_19 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
choices: matter of fact(realistic)/issue-oriented(focused on or concerned with a specific issue eg . social or political)
sensitive/people-oriented( focused on interaction with people)

questions.question_title: question_20 : In Which Category Do You Belong ?
